feed.title: A repository of my thoughts | David Kua

entry.title: First Post!
entry.summary:
In [1]:
print "Hello World!"

Hello World!

In [2]:
# This is some test code!

def fizzbuzz(n):
    for i in xrange(n + 1):
        result = ""
        if i % 3 == 0:
            result += "fizz"
        if i % 5 == 0:
            result += "buzz"
        if result == "":
            result = i
        print(result)
In [3]:
fizzbuzz(100)
